original_text: Those men gave to the Israelites a bad report about the land that they had explored. They said, ‘We went through that whole land and we explored it. The land seems to eat the people who live there! All the people that we saw there were very big and strong.
korean_text: 이스라엘 자손 앞에서 그 정탐한 땅을 악평하여 이르되 우리가 두루 다니며 정탐한 땅은 그 거주민을 삼키는 땅이요 거기서 본 모든 백성은 신장이 장대한 자들이며

sentences.original_text: Those men gave to the Israelites a bad report
sentences.korean_translation: 그 사람들은 이스라엘 사람들에게 나쁜 보고를 주었습니다

sentences.original_text: about the land that they had explored
We went through that whole land
The land seems to eat the people who live there
sentences.korean_translation: 그 땅은 거기 사는 사람들을 먹는 것 같습니다

sentences.original_text: All the people that we saw there
